alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 6:38PM MDT until June 07 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR EASTERN OTERO...SOUTHERN KIOWA AND NORTHWESTERN BENT COUNTIES... At 638 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blue Lake, or 21 miles northeast of North La Junta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Blue Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
